sentences.en: A bold adventurer may sometimes acquire a considerable fortune by two or three successful speculations.
sentences.cn: 大胆的冒险者,有时也许由于两三次投机的成功而获得很大一笔财产.

sentences.en: Adventure: The bariaur's wanderlust makes them an ideal adventurer.
sentences.cn: 冒险: 半人羊的漫游癖使得他们成为理想的冒险者.

sentences.en: Adventurer: Ok. Here is Lake Itasca, the true source of the Mississippi.
sentences.cn: 探险者: 好了. 这就是伊塔斯卡湖, 密西西比河的真正源头.

sentences.en: Dogmatic and exaggerating, you could be an adventurer or a gambler.
sentences.cn: 自以为是跟夸张的态度, 你可以是个冒险家或是个赌徒.

sentences.en: Don't break in when the adventurer is telling his own story.
sentences.cn: 冒险家讲他自己的经历时,别打断他.

sentences.en: He is an adventurer in financial field.
sentences.cn: 他是金融领域的投机者.

sentences.en: He is an adventurer who traces leaky plumbing to its source.
sentences.cn: 他是个冒险家,他追踪水管漏水,一直追踪到它的根源.

sentences.en: James Cook , English adventurer , reached New Zealand.
sentences.cn: 英国探险家 詹姆斯·库克 到达新西兰.

sentences.en: No adventurer of this type ever came to a good end!
sentences.cn: 像这样铤而走险的人是不会有好结果的!

sentences.en: The adventurer awoke to find himself tied down to the ground with long ropes.
sentences.cn: 这位冒险者醒来,发现自己被长绳捆在地上.

sentences.en: The adventurer recked little of the danger and hardships.
sentences.cn: 冒险者对危险和困苦毫不在意.

sentences.en: The adventurer shuddered at the remembrance.
sentences.cn: 这位冒险者在回忆中战栗起来.

sentences.en: The adventurer started out at midnight in a temperature of 30 below zero.
sentences.cn: 这位冒险家在晚上十二点钟,冒着摄氏零下30度的严寒出发了.

sentences.en: The adventurer was hell - bent on her own way.
The aviation adventurer broke records for circling a globe alone in a balloon.
sentences.cn: 他曾打破独自乘坐热气球环游地球的记录.
